name: Wall Of The Eyeless - Wimfolsfestta CD+Shirt Bundle
Wall Of The Eyeless - No Return T-Shirt
description:
First ever and very limited Wall Of The Eyeless T-Shirt. Printed in Sweden. 
High quality screen print on Fruit Of The Loom T-Shirts.
Designed by SL.

name: Wall Of The Eyeless - Wimfolsfestta [Demo 2013] (Webstore Exclusive DIY CD/DVD, Ltd. 50!)
Wall Of The Eyeless - Wimfolsfestta [Demo 2013] (HQ Factory press Digipak CD, Ltd. 300!)
Wall Of The Eyeless - Through Emptiness [Demo 2011] (DIY 2013 Repress, Ltd. 30!)
description:
Wall Of The Eyeless's first demo, self-released by the band on the 31st of December 2011.
Comes on a high quality printed CDR with 8-page booklet with info, lyrics, drawings and photos, in a jewel case with a sticker.

This is a limited repress from April 2013, limited to just 30 copies! The first press of the demo got sold out a long time ago, but some people still want it, so here it is.

Reviews in the press:
4 / 5 (Brutalism Zine, The Netherlands), 
8 / 10 (Metal Curse, The USA), 
72/100 (Lords Of Metal, The Netherlands), 
7.5/10 (Metallic Faith Immortal, The USA), 
80/100, 77/100, 83/100, 78/100, 89/100 (Metal Archives), 
3.5/5 (Full Metal Attorney, The USA), 
7/10 (Metalhead.it, Italy), 
7/10 (Death Metal Baboon), 
8/10 (Darkside, Russia), 
6/6 (Atmospheric Magazine, Poland),
7/10 (Greek Rebels, Greece),
89/100 (Infernal Masquerade), 
7/10 (ThisIsNotAScene), 
8/10 (CrossFire, Germany), 
7.5 / 10 (Pest Zine, Romania), 
7.5 / 10 (Stereo Invaders, Italy), 
7 / 10 (Der Metal Krieger), 
7.5 / 10 (Metal Wani), 
7 / 10 (Rockfreaks.net, Denmark) 
75 / 100 (Timpani Allo Spiedo, Italy), 
5 / 5 (Valkyrian Music, The UK), 
4-/5 (Damned By Light), 
7 / 10 Skrik Zine (Norway) plus really good reviews without scores from Heavy Metal Tribune (Singapore), Sound And Motion Magazine (The UK), Puro Ruido (Spain), Battle Helm (USA/UK/Sweden), Two Guys Metal Reviews, DoomedToDarkness Zine and Forbidden Magazine (The USA). 

Additional photo - the demo CDs: 
http://tinyurl.com/wotedemos


If you want the item to be signed for you, please drop a line to us!

*We use only the registered airmail to avoid any type of problems and can supply you with a parcel tracking code if you want one. 

Thanks for your support!
